definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="188" y="33"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CrackedBone</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="shoot_arrow"><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon Fireball ~ ~ ~ {direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:1}</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute @a[type=Arrow,distance=..2] ~ ~ ~ /summon fireball ~ ~ ~ {direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0]}</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
